name: Pokémon Vega
overview: Description: Pokémon Vega is probably the highest regarded of all foreign-language Pokémon hacks. Created by a group of Japanese hackers, it contains a new region, all sorts of new Pokémon and moves, and a significant challenge. Features: •New region- Tohoak •181 new Pokémon, plus 56 from newer gens •70 new moves, plus 87 from newer gens •Custom soundtrack •Rematches with important trainers •Extensive postgame including a battle facility
